body.name: aMZCaSE LED Wireless Mouse, Rechargeable Slim Silent Mice 2.4G Portable Office Optical Mouse with USB Receiver and Type-C Adapter, 3 Adjustable DPI for Laptop, Computer, PC, Notebook, Desktop (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 35 mins
features: 【Upgraded Version LED Design】Upgraded version wireless mouse with the LED lights. The bottom of cordless mouse has a switch, support independent opening of basic mouse functions and decorative breathing light mode. When you turn on the LED light mode, it can be cyclically transformed into a variety of different colors add fun to boring work and life.

【Rechargeable and Super Energy saving】Led wireless mouse has a built-in 500mAh durable rechargeable battery, it can be easily charged using the included USB cable without replacing the battery. Just 2-3 hours charging, it will last for 7 to 15 days. USB wireless mouse goes into hibernation after 10 minutes of no operation to save energy, wake up with a click of any mouse button.

【3 Adjustable DPI and Silent Click】3 DPI Settings of 1000, 1200 and 1600, free to meet different working needs. We have made special processing for mouse buttons to meet most people's pursuit of silent mouse. Ergonomic design and suitable button strength make you comfortable enough to work and study.

【Silm and Portable】RGB Optical Mouse about 4.41 x 2.26 x 1.06 inch, and the weight is about 75g, lightweight and slim. Portable wireless mouse perfect for travelling carry and it can be easily put into your laptop bag or pockets, ultra-space saving.

【Wide Compatibility and Long Warranty】RGB wireless mouse fits for almost all devices including PC, Macbook, desktop, laptop, tablet and iPad, and well compatible with Windows 7/ 8/ 10/ XP, iOS, Android, Vista and more. Warm Tips: If your laptop just with Type-C port, You need connect the supplied Type-C to USB adapter to your laptop and plug the USB receiver in to it. aMZCaSE Backed by 60-day money back, 1-year replacement.

productInformation.name: Special Feature

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AMZCASE LED Wireless Mouse Features: RGB BacklightingRechargeable (No additional batteries required)Plug-and-PlaySilent ClickPortable (Carry it with you)Slim (Effectively relieves your wrist fatigue)Multi-purpose (Office, home, travel)Auto-sleep (Energy saving) How to Use? Before using the mouse for the first time, please charge it for about 2 hours.Remove the USB receiver placed on the back of the mouse.Plug the USB receiver into your computer's USB port.Turn on the switch at the bottom of the mouse.You are ready to use it without any operation.

Suitable for Most Devices The wireless mouse has a Type-C adapter, which can be applied to most devices with USB ports and Type-C ports. The USB receiver is placed on the bottom of the mouse. Superb Durability AMZCASE 2.4G wireless mouse can withstand more than 10 million click tests. High accuracy, high sensitivity, high battery life. 3 DPI Adjustable The wireless rechargeable mouse has a 3-level DPI adjustable mode, which can meet your different needs and feel comfortable. Automatic sleep in 10 minutes, full charge in 2-3 hours.

Note: 1. If your computer is Type-C port, you need to plug the Type-C adapter into your computer first, and then plug the USB receiver into the Type-C adapter. Turn on the switch at the bottom of the mouse, and the mouse will work properly. 2. When charging, the blue light next to the scroll wheel will light up, after the mouse is fully charged, the blue light will go out. 3. When the battery of the mouse is low, the mouse cursor will move slowly or stop moving, please charge it in time. 4. Please use the computer USB interface for wireless mouse charging (the mouse supports working while charging).

Turn on the switch at the bottom of the mouse, and the mouse will work properly. 2. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work when directly plugged in
reviews.reviewText: Love the way it feels and works. The port that connects to the computer is EXTREMELY tight. So I don't remove it because you have to wiggle it to get it out. It does not work while plugged in and charging. And the battery only lasts a short bit if left with color rotate on. But it's pretty and I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with Linux!
reviews.reviewText: This mouse, despite that it omits Linux as being compatible in the details of the product description, does indeed work with Linux. I have tested and used it on the following distributions: Ubuntu (23.04 and 22.04 LTS), Fedora (33, 38), Pop!OS (22.04 LTS) as well as a highly restricted and minimal Fedora 33 install where a lot of drivers are simply not present in the kernel.In every single case the all functions of the mouse worked, flawlessly, including the scroll wheel that doubles as a third mouse button. The DPI functions as well work as expected. None of these required additional software.Yes, I tested also with the original Windows 10 release all the way to the latest Windows 11 release. Zero problems as well.Battery life is irrelevant, this is a 100% wired mouse.For sleep mode, that is more of a function related to wireless mice. Because this mouse is wired it is powered by the USB bus on your computer. So if you want to use the mouse after your computer has entered sleep / standby mode then you need to make sure that your BIOS / UEFI is configured to allow "wake from USB".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite mouse!!
reviews.reviewText: I love that this mouse is rechargeable! It last a long time, I forget to charge it, but I could use it while is charging, which hasn’t happened very often! And I use it a lot!! Love that I don’t have to worry about buying batteries! It is so slim that if fits on my back up very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job...for a while.
reviews.reviewText: I had been using Microsoft's Arc Mouse for a couple of years and really liked them. Then, I got a couple sticks of Corsair's RGB RAM and wanted to stay with the RGB theme when my last mouse started showing signs of slowing down, so I picked this one. I really liked the idea of being able to recharge the mouse directly, without replacing the batteries-still do, in fact. BUT the scroll wheel is dead. Only eight months after landing on my desk, and this wheel has decided that it just doesn't want to do its job, anymore. I dunno. I guess I didn't pay that much for it, but I still think that's kinda crappy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice and fells really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The mouse does not work out of the box in Windows 10 Pro.
reviews.reviewText: I was very disappointed with the functioning of this mouse. The ergonomics were ok, the build quality seemed very nice and the price point was excellent. The problem with it seems to be the complete lack of out of box support under Windows 10 Pro. I tried it on several USB ports, both on my motherboard and on an externally powered hub. I also tried it after several reboots with my current mouse installed and removed. No dice. The basic Human Interface controller functionality (i.e. the cheapest mouse you can get) did not function properly so the mouse pointer would not move. The box/material had no website to check for a driver and a hotmail address as the wholesale contact (I knew I was in serious trouble when I saw that lol )The buttons did click as mentioned by a previous reviewer. However without mouse motion functionality the mouse is useless. This definitely points to hardware support issues (or a bad mouse). I do believe this mouse is zoned for sale by the manufacturer in some region of the world where it is probably supplied with foreign language drivers. An hour of searching on the Internet yielded no safe driver download (no driver download at all in fact). This is my first 1 star review on Amazon and I've been a member almost since its inception. I'm sure with proper hardware support this product would be worth the money but in this age of high DPI, software controlled mice selling something like this on Amazon is not a good idea if you want good feedback. If the full basic human interface functionality at say 2200 dpi had worked without the driver as it should have I would have given the product 3 stars, as it stands it is useless so I have to give it 1 star and return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great colors and great battery life
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Loving the mouse so far! The colors are great, and there's a button at the bottom if you don't want the colors. I'm not consistently using this mouse every single day. So not sure how this compares to everyday use, but so far I've had it for almost exactly 3 weeks and I haven't had to charge it yet!Only slight nitpick, which may be to be expected, but from day 1 it started to show use of wear. Not a dealbreaker for me but did make me go "aw man".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this in May of 2023, it broke mid January. It was great and worked well till the wheel broke.

reviews.reviewTitle: well lit, works great, fits in palm of hand, comfort and value for the money
reviews.reviewText: no dislikes, nice to have rechargable instead of using battery, love the feel, comfort, and well lit

I ordered this mouse for my new laptop. It had a coupon so I got it for $11 and I'm surprised to say it actually works really well and super smoothly. I also really like that it works off a charge and not batteries
Great little mouse , easy to install , no fuss, straight forward. Happy with this product.

I bought this mouse in February. The wheel stopped in less than a month. Reached out to seller who promised to send a replacement. After few follows ups the seller replied that they don't the mouse in the stock and will send once they get new stock. It has been many months and the company continue to sell the mouse on Amazon which showing that they have plenty in stock but are not willing to honor their promise about warranty.

Been using this for a week now and it's great. I don't game so I don't know how it is for that but I use it all work all day long. It's comfy and flat. If you like the "bubble" mice don't go for this one. The flatness doesn't bother me and it doesn't hurt my hands. It's a nice quiet click. Colors are awesome and I love there's no batteries and it's a rechargable unit. Would def buy again!
